posts.name: Harsh Bathija
posts.cooked:
Hello Everyone,

After submitting my answers for project 2 I get a test run of 100/100 but I get this error message: “Your submission has wrong answers. Please recheck the submission”.

The error message is contradictory, because the very first message says “Please note that the actual evaluation of your answer will be done only after the due date and the test run results indicative of file format alone.”

So what does this error message mean? Does it mean that answers are wrong or the formatting is wrong? I’m not able to solve this even 2 days after trying and I don’t know what I’m doing wrong.

Could anyone please advise?

@carlton

Thanks.

posts.name: Swati Jain
posts.cooked:
Solution to TDS Project "Wrong answer thing" Tools in Data Science
Hello, I saw a lot of my friends still struggling with wrong answer thing which says - Your submission has wrong answers. Please recheck the submission Solution - Use notepad or simple text editors Format Q1, 678 Q2,“Answer” Q3,7.89 Save as csv file you can name it anything. Why without quotes thing is working yet not recommended??? When you use Excel or Google sheets - they by default add quotes for strings (See image below - it doesn’t have correct answers just shared for format) s…

Do this

posts.name: Talha Mahmood
posts.cooked:
@aman1011 , @23f2003589

If you have confirmed that your answers are correct, try checking them in Excel using the respective CSV file, especially for the questions involving string types. Then, create a new Notepad file to write the answers in the format described earlier, save it as a .csv, and resubmit it. I had the same issue, and this approach helped me resolve it. I suggest copying and pasting the exact answers you got for the string-type questions, making sure they are enclosed in double quotes.
